css: .cover-unternehmensloesungen-section { padding: 4rem 0; } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 3rem; align-items: center; background-color: #f9fafb; border-radius: 1.5rem; overflow: hidden; } @media (min-width: 992px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } .content-side { padding: 3rem; } .pre-title { font-size: 0.8rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } h1 { font-size: clamp(2.2rem, 5vw, 2.8rem); font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } .content-side > p { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .cta-group { display: flex; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 3rem; } .btn { padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; } .btn-dark { background-color: var(--color-dark); color: var(--color-light); } .btn-light { background-color: #e5e7eb; color: var(--color-dark); } .stats-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 1.5rem; } .stat-card h3 { font-size: 2.5rem; } .stat-card p { font-size: 0.9rem; } .image-side img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; }

de.name: Unternehmenslösungen
